content: @WG-prioritization I've made the procedure doc look a bit more like a procedure and less like an script (that's what the script on triagebot is about) take a look at it here https://hackmd.io/pHb6eTZ2Sjy6XZmwXZHIBA?view
I think it's a more or less ok version
but I think it would be nice mainly if people that were not sure about how the procedure works, look at it and confirm everything is understood or if we need to clarify better
would be nice if slowly we have some documentation that helps more people get involved

that document is still kind of a mix of things that @pnkfelix needs and things that we do, it may be a good idea maybe if @pnkfelix makes a copy that he uses and this is more about the prioritization procedure maybe ?
or well we can make a copy too :) but I meant, I'd like to split into 2 different things
I specifically want whatever document I use to be public. Ideally it would also be vetted by otehrs.
Because I want others to be able to follow the document in order to run the meeting, when necessary
but I don't object to splitting the document up into more pieces

(The pieces should probably cross-reference each-other. At least, it seems to me like the people doing pre-triage might need to reference the triage procedure in order to understand how their work impacts things.)
@pnkfelix going to do that
will leave this as "your" document so you don't need to change anything, just when you open this document it will look different :)
@pnkfelix here is "your" document, feel free to change in the way you want because we won't use any of that stuff
the things the WG will use are linked from that document
the links I've pasted in the top of this topic are now wrong :)
